Directives > ui-file-select

ui-file-select

Launch 

                    <ui-file-select load-files="loadFiles()" launch-id="launch-file-select"
                    file-select-callback="selectFilesCallback(files)">
                    </ui-file-select>

Launch, disable view toggle 

                    <ui-file-select load-files="loadFiles()" launch-id="launch-file-select2"
                    disable-view-toggle="true" initial-view-type="tile"
                    file-select-callback="selectFilesCallback(files)">
                    </ui-file-select>

Launch, disable view toggle, disable upload 

                    <ui-file-select  load-files="loadFiles()" launch-id="launch-file-select3"
                    disable-upload="true" disable-view-toggle="true" initial-view-type="tile"
                    file-select-callback="selectFilesCallback(files)"></ui-file-select>

Launch, disable upload 

                    <ui-file-select load-files="loadFiles()" launch-id="launch-file-select4"
                    disable-upload="true" initial-view-type="list"
                    file-select-callback="selectFilesCallback(files)"></ui-file-select>

ui-file-select Options

Name type description
launch-id string The unique identifier of the DOM element which will invoke the select files dialog.
load-files function The callback function to be invoked when generating the list of files to be displayed. The files list must be in the JSON form: 
{
    name: "beforetomcat.png",
    date: "2015-06-03T08:24:45.306Z",
    size: 45813,
    url: "/api/projects/071df815009df7210a318cc0/document/556eb9cd1b27a77beec5fdaa/render/?thumbOnly=true"
}

This JSON can have other attributes.
disable-view-toggle boolean Indicates if the view toggle is displayed in the dialog. The toggle allows the user to switch between list view and tile view.
initial-view-type string The initial view type to be shown when the component is invoked. Can be either 'list' or 'view'. Defaults to 'list' if not supplied.
disable-upload boolean Indicates if the file upload functionality should be included in the dialog.
NOTE: File upload functionality has not yet been delivered as part of this component.
file-select-callback function The callback function to be invoked after the dialog has been closed. This callback will be invoked with the list of selected files choosen.
